the audio is reaaally low. But it works

There are numerous ways to boost the audio.
If you're gonna make a DVD with convertxtodvd go to the audio tab and boost it... "average level 67%" should be more than enough.
If you wanna keep it in .avi, run it thru Avidemux, drop audio tab, filters, gain.
the torrent is good quality. sound is ok too. the movie itself is a bit overrated.
